original_text: Then Babylon's army broke down Jerusalem's wall so that they could go into the city. Their soldiers were all around the city. So the king of Judah and all his army tried to escape in the night. They went through the gate that was near the king's garden. The path went between the two walls of the city. They ran towards the Jordan Valley.
korean_text: 그 성벽이 파괴되매 모든 군사가 밤중에 그 성에서 나가 두 성벽 사이 왕의 동산 곁문 길로 도망하여 갈대아인들이 그 성읍을 에워쌌으므로 그들이 아라바 길로 가더니

sentences.original_text: Then Babylon's army broke down Jerusalem's wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 바빌론 군대가 예루살렘의 성벽을 부쉈습니다

sentences.original_text: so that they could go into the city
Their soldiers were all around the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 군사들은 성 주위에 모두 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: So the king of Judah and all his army tried to escape
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 유다 왕과 그의 모든 군대는 도망치려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They tried to escape in the night
They went through the gate that was near the king's garden
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 왕의 동산 근처에 있는 문을 통해 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: The path went between the two walls of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그 길은 성의 두 성벽 사이를 지났습니다

sentences.original_text: They ran towards the Jordan Valley
